name: Pumpkin Party (vidmantas)
description:
Pumpkin Party is a relaxing sokoban-style game. Help Piggy push pumpkins around and solve various levels.

Features:

  • Simple and colorful low-poly style
  • 88 levels of varying difficulty
  • A challenge to solve all the levels in as few moves as possible

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space/Enter to select/interact
  • R to reset
  • Z/Backspace to undo

Credits:

Developed by Vidmantas Luneckas
Additional sounds effects from www.zapsplat.com
